description: Observations to the City of London Corporation about a proposal to redevelopment of the site behind partially retained facade to South Place and erection of a new 9 storey office building (ground floor plus 8 storeys) (Class B1(a)) with alternative use of part ground and part lower ground for either retail (Class A1/A2/A3/A4) or Class D2 (gymnasium) or Class B1(a) (offices), roof top and basement M & E plant, together with servicing facilities, one disabled car parking space and cycle parking and other associated ancillary works. (Total floorspace: 23,928sqm).
decision_conditions: That the City of London Corporation be informed that this Planning Authority has no observations on the proposal to refurbish and extend River Plate House.
ward:
Within City (near Bunhill Ward)
Within City (near Clerkenwell Ward)
